pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, December 19, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, December 19, 2017:

Montréal, Quebec

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Montréal, Valérie Plante.

Montréal City Hall
275 rue Notre-Dame Est

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity of arrival and at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 9 a.m. by the 510 Gosford entrance

Ottawa, Ontario

6 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the U.S. Secretary of State, Rex Tillerson.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block, Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

7 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Diplomatic Corps Holiday Reception.

Closed to media.

Media appearances

  • An interview with the Prime Minister will air at 9 a.m. during Mornings Rock on CHOM 97.7 FM.
